name: Return (GregWS)
description:
Return is a short experiment I created for the final Super Friendship Club game-making pageant in August of 2012. The theme was ‘Ritual’, and a generating idea for this was the ritual of returning to a place from memory. In March of 2013 I made some significant modifications to the nature of the work’s interactivity, and I think the experience is better as a result.

NOTE: I’ve had trouble with crackly sound on my Windows 8 machine, but I don’t know how to begin fixing it. Hopefully you don’t encounter this too.
